column5: Youth without shelter is entered into an online contest to win 7500$ . Sponsored by Woodbine entertainment.  My brother in law has spent the better part of his life helping these kids age (16-24) get on there feet.  Youth without shelter is non profit and provides housing/education/job opportunities and a safe place.  All you need to do is go to   WEGcares  and follow the voting instructions. It only takes a minute   Many Thanks.  Don
